rule: The <em> tag content must not emphasize additional key words or phrases within the sentence.
input: Time moves on. Life changes. Seasons pass.
validityText:
The given input is a paragraph of text. According to the input specification, the input must contain at least three sentences. In this input, there are three sentences: "Time moves on.", "Life changes.", and "Seasons pass." Each sentence is correctly terminated with a period, meeting the requirement for a complete sentence. There are no violations of the input specification since the input satisfies the specified requirement of containing at least three sentences.

OK
coverageText:

```html
Seasons pass with the rhythm of nature. Each one brings its own beauty and significance.

```
